post.summary: Add a room to the session's basket
post.description:
The request should be built with the info returned by the Hub API search endpoint.

A room is identified by its `RoomId`, its `RateId` and its `OccupancyId`

If the room added is already in the basket (regarding its identifier), it is replaced with new values.
If a quantity of 0 is provided, the room is deleted.

204.description: The basket has been updated correctly

401.description: Authentication header is invalid or does not give access to the operation

post.summary: Add an extra to the session's basket
post.description:
The request should be built with the info returned by the Hub API search endpoint.

An extra is identified by its `ExtraId`. For a room extra, the `RoomId` must be specified.

If the extra is already in the basket (regarding to its identifier), it is replaced with new values.
If a quantity of 0 is provided, the extra is deleted.

204.description: The basket has been updated correctly

The **X-AVP-Properties** header attribute  can contain some or all the following values, separated with | character:
* `Information`

* `Offers`

* `CancelConditions`

The **X-AVP-DescriptionType** header attribute can contain one of the following values:
* `text/html` (default)
* `text/plain`
* `text/x-markdown`

The **X-AVP-PictureTemplates** should contains the list of picture templates requested, separated with | character.

get.description:
This action Gives access to the configuration of the user session. Some of the data in the session can be updated: 
* `context`
* `filters`
* `sortType`
* `display`

Some other properties cannot be updated, like
* `sessionId`
* `scope`, it is defined dynamically regarding the session context
* `activePromoCode`, as it provides the status of the property in `session.context.promoCode`

400.description: The session is invalid or does not exist

Once deleted, it cannot be retrieved.

get.description:
Provides the boundaries of the session usage:
* `hotelIds`, `roomIds`, and `rateIds` list the ids that can be used with the session. The values come from the engine configuration.
* `ActivePromoCode` details the configuration of the promo code set up in the property `session.context.promoCode`.
* `selectedRateIds` list all ids matching the property `session.context.selectedRateCode`
* `selectedroomIds` list all ids matching the property `session.context.selectedRoomCode`
* `highlightedRateIds` list all ids matching the property `session.context.highlightedRateCode`

400.description: The session is invalid or does not exist

401.description: Authentication header is invalid or does not give access to the operation

get.description:
This endpoint provides information related to the session:
* `pendingBasketId` is the internal id used for redirecting the hub basket for usage on the SmartBE application. If you modify the Hub session basket, you must call this endpoint again in order to get the latest Availpro API pending basket. If the basket is empty, the pendingBasketId is empty
* `visitId`, `avpCampaignId` and `trackingId` are ids passed in the create session endpoint, used for tracking the session on the different trackers used by the CoreBE.
* `OriginalSearchCriteria` contains the search context passed to the create session endpoint.

401.description: Authentication header is invalid or does not give access to the operation

post.description:
This method creates a session that will identify the user. It stores the scope, the search context and the display options. The returned `sessionId`
will be used to identify the session for all of the other operations

### Search context
This object defines the user selection for his search.
* `SelectedHotelId` is the hotel id selected by the user. If the engine configuration contains a single hotel, the SelectedHotelId will be automatically selected and does not need to be provided.
* `SelectedRoomCode` is the room selected by the user. It can be a room code or a room id. If the room code is not available, a `InvalidRoomId` error is thrown.
* `SelectedRateCode` is the rate selected by the user. It can be a rate code or a rate id. If the rate code is not available, a `InvalidRateId` error is thrown.
* `HighlightedRateCode` is the rate that will be placed in first on search results. It can be a rate code or a rate id. If the rate code is not available, a `InvalidRateId` error is thrown.
* `PromoCode` is the discount code or the rate code that can be used by the client. If the promo code is not available, `InvalidPromoCode`, `InvalidPromoCodeBookingPeriod` or `InvalidPromoCodeStayPeriod` can be thrown
* `ExcludeMixedRates` defines in the session if the search results may contain room availabilities with multiple rates. If the engine is configured with mixed rates disabled, then the user cannot override the value and is forced to `false`.
### Display options
This property contains the `culture` and the `currency` to use for all of the calls to the API. Every human readable texts (except technical
error messages) will use the culture property to provide the corresponding translation. The money amounts will also be converted using the
matching currency defined in this property.

200.description: Indicates that the session was created correctly

400.description: Some parameters are invalid or missing, check the error code value for more details

401.description: Authentication header is invalid or does not give access to the operation

patch.description:
Use this method to update the display parameters that will be used for formatting the data
responses for prices and translated texts (like entity descriptions).

### Culture
It must be formatted like 'xx-XX'.
If the requested culture is not a valid one, an error is returned.

204.description: The session display is updated correctly

400.description: Some parameters are invalid or missing, check the error code value for more details

patch.summary: Update the search filters for rooms.
patch.description:
Available filters and filters values are returned by each search results.

The sent filters replace existing filters in the session.
If a filter is sent with no values, it is deleted from the session.

Since these filters are contextual, they should be reset when Context is modified.

204.description: The session filters are updated correctly

400.description: Some parameters are invalid or missing, check the error code value for more details

Availpro.BookingEngine.Hub.Model.Session.description: Describes the details of the guests count.

countryCode.description: The country where the customer live.

phoneNumber.description:
The phone number of the customer.
It is validated against the phoneConstraint associated with the PhoneCountryCode.

phoneCountryCode.description: The country used to validate the phone number and define the international prefix.

emailAddress.description: Must be a valid email address.

arrivalTime.description: The time of arrival. Must be between 00:00 and 24:00.

roomId.description: The id of the room in which the guest will stay.

occupancyId.description: The id of the occupancy in which the guest will stay.

itemNumber.description: The room identifier number (1-based) in the basket in order to identify each room in guest distribution process

optinHotel.description: True if the end user was proposed to receive information from the hotel.

optinPartners.description: True if the end user was proposed to receive information from the hotel's partners.

optinHotelAccepted.description: True if the end user accepts to receive information from the hotel.

optinPartnersAccepted.description: True if the end user accepts to receive information from the hotel's partners.

redirectionUrl.description: The redirect url to send to the browser for the end of the booking process.

roomId.description: The room to add in the basket, as provided by the search/rooms endpoint.

rateId.description: The rate to add in the basket, as provided by the search/rooms endpoint.

occupancyId.description: The occupancy to add in the basket, as provided by the search/rooms endpoint.

quantity.description: The quantity to add in the basket. Must not exceed the available quantity provided by the search/rooms endpoint.

guestPosition.description: The guest position in the `Session.Context.Guests` list the selected room will be occupied by.

extraId.description: The extra to add in the basket, as provided by the search/extras endpoint.

roomId.description: The roomId of the extra to add in the basket (only for room extras), as provided by the search/extras endpoint.

quantity.description: The quantity to add in the basket. Must not exceed the available quantity provided by the search/extras endpoint.

guestPosition.description: The guest position in the `Session.Context.Guests` list the selected room will be occupied by.

universalValue.description: Universal booking engine value. Includes crs prefix.

sessionId.description:
The unique identifier of the session.
The session is used to identify the end user. 
The `sessionId` is used to identify the session for all of the other operations on this API.

engineId.description: The Availpro reference of the booking engine.

groupId.description: The Availpro group id of the booking engine.

basket.description: The current basket of the user.

roomFilters.description: The room filters configured by the end user.

hotelFilters.description: The hotel filters configured by the end user.

roomSortType.description: Define the way room results are sorted when performing a search.

hotelSortType.description: Define the way hotel results are sorted when performing a search.

bookingEngineMode.description: Define the modes for a booking engine.

culture.description: The culture name, used to localize results of other endpoints.

currency.description: The ISO code of the currency requested, used to configure price in the results.

countryCode.description: The country code from client browser.

Availpro.BookingEngine.Hub.Model.Session.description:
This represent the parameters used to configure future call to the service.
It represents more or less the data entered by the final customer.

selectedHotelId.description:
The currently selected hotel id.
Could be zero when starting a session for a multi hotel booking engine.
Automatically set when starting a session for a mono hotel booking engine.

promoCode.description:
The promo code requested for the session.
It could be either an OfferCode or a RateCode.

excludeMixedRates.description: Configure whether the search results should include mixed rates or not.

disableCrossSell.description: Configure whether the search results should return cross sell configuration when no rooms are available.

gpsPosition.description: If defined the search results should be based on user's location.

type.description: Define the type of the filter.

values.description: The values defined for this category.

type.description: Define the type of the filter.

values.description: The values defined for this category.

guestSelectionMode.description: Guest selection mode handling mode `PerBooking` or `PerRoom`.

Availpro.BookingEngine.Hub.Model.Session.description: Describe a period of stay by specifying the arrival date and the departure date.
The scope of the session. It defines which engine, hotels, rooms and rates the session is allowed to use.

hotelIds.description: Hotel ids of the current scope.

roomIds.description: Room ids of the current scope.

rateIds.description: Rate ids of the current scope.

extraIds.description: Extra ids of the current scope.

activePromoCode.description: This property is filled with the details of the promocode if the one configured in the context is a valid one.

mealPlanIds.description: MealPlan ids of the current scope.

engineId.description: The engine for which to create a session. This is the only property that is required to create a session.

guestSelectionMode.description: The guest selection mode (per room or per booking).

customTrackingValues.description: Allow the API client to store values that have been provided through URL at the beginning of the booking process.

device.description: Allow the API client to store the device type of the end user at the beginning of the booking process.

ipAddress.description: Allow the API client to store the user ip address.

warnings.description: Possible values are : InvalidStayPeriod, InvalidRateId, InvalidRoomId, InvalidPromoCode, InvalidGuests

paymentType.description: The payment type chose by the end user. It must have been proposed by the accept quote in a previous request.

paymentModeName.description: The payment name chose by the end user. It must have been proposed by the accept quote in a previous request.

subscribeInsurance.description: True if the end user had chosen to subscribe to the proposed insurance.

customerDetails.description: Details of the customer (i.e. the end user which pay the booking).

guestDetails.description: Details of the guests (i.e. the people which will stay at the hotel).

PageNumber.name: pageNumber
PageNumber.description: The number of the requested page.

PageSize.name: pageSize
PageSize.description: The number of results per response.

GuestPosition.name: guestPosition
GuestPosition.description: The index of a room which corresponds to the `index` of a guest.

SessionDisplay.description: The new display object, containing both the culture and the currency.

UpdateSessionRoomFiltersRequest.description: The filters to set in the session.

UpdateSessionHotelFiltersRequest.description: The filters to set in the session.
